Get NBA Stats API Shot Chart Detail

Source: R/nba_stats_shotchart.R
sc.Rd

Get NBA Stats API Shot Chart Detail

Get NBA Stats API Shot Chart Detail

Usage

nba_shotchartdetail(
  context_measure = "FGA",
  date_from = "",
  date_to = "",
  game_id = "",
  game_segment = "",
  last_n_games = 0,
  league_id = "00",
  location = "",
  month = 0,
  opponent_team_id = 0,
  outcome = "",
  period = 0,
  player_id = "202696",
  player_position = "",
  rookie_year = "",
  season = "2020-21",
  season_segment = "",
  season_type = "Regular Season",
  team_id = 0,
  vs_conference = "",
  vs_division = "",
  ...
)

Arguments

context_measure

...

Additional arguments passed to an underlying function like httr.

Value

Return a named list of data frames: LeagueAverages, Shot_Chart_Detail
